description:
What ads catch your eye? Why are you attracted to? What is the key to selling? Do you know what your customer wants and how to give it to them? ... In this course you will learn the secrets creativity of advertising communication.

Synopsis:

Participants of this course will know the world of advertising and its key from within.

They themselves become advertising agencies and conduct a communication campaign for a company.

Author:

Franco Soldi (Founder & CEO YPD Captain)

Goals:

  • Develop creativity.
  • Learn to design and present an advertising campaign.
  • Develop communication skills and marketing.

Tips:

  • Throughout the dynamic participants should be made aware and realize the importance of empathy with the customer, innovative solutions and give surprise to present them.
  • In the present challenge participants will face a test of creativity and empathy with the customer.
title: Desarrolla tu creatividad en el mundo de la publicidad
